name: Destroy Darkness
description: You target an undead or dark creature within a moderate (20 unit) distance and strike them with purifying light. The target must make a resilience check of 10 or take 15 divine damage. If they roll a 5 or less on their check, they are instantly destroyed instead.
charge: The spell becomes a 5 unit radius centered on yourself, but only affecting all standard tier and lower undead or dark creatures in the area.
